review: It would not maintain a constant wifi connection so I returned it to Best Buy.
author: Edgar Holguin

review: Easy to install and works great.  Well worth the money.
author: J. Harris

review: Very easy set up and use!!
author: Terri

review: Great except Netflix doesn't sync well.
author: Jaclyn Berry

review: Wish I would have bought this little gadget sooner. Amazon Prime becomes even more of a bargain!
author: Rachell

review: Easy to use, setup & very functional
author: Nixsa L. Serrano

review: Very easy to set-up.  Works well with an HDMI switch, for a TV with only one or two HDMI slots.  No RCA-type stereo output jacks, so I can't connect the sound to an amplifier or home theater setup.  Still working on a couple of technical bugs - some TV video does not appear in full screen format, and sometimes the wireless signal to the Fire Stick seems to become too weak.  Could be a problem with my cable provider.
author: P. Carson "Audiobook Raven"
